formElement.documentation: A JIRA project that will be used
formElement.label: JIRA project name:

formElement.documentation: If checked, no data will be sent to the reporting system. Use this option to preview gathered data.
formElement.label: Preview:

formElement.htmlDocumentation: Allows user to provide perl script for payload customization. This method will be invoked by plugin with 2 parameters. 1st parameter is context object, 2nd is payload object. Method should be named "transform", and should return payload object. In this example myTimestamp field will be added to payload object: sub transform { my ($context, $payload) = @_;$payload->{myTimestamp} = $context->one();return $payload;}sub one {my ($context) = @_;return time();}
formElement.documentation: Perl code to transform report payload.
formElement.label: Transformation Script:

formElement.documentation: If checked, the log level will be set to "Debug" for the job.
formElement.label: Debug:

formElement.documentation: Name of the CloudBees Flow release collected data relates to.
formElement.label: Release Name:

formElement.documentation: Name of the CloudBees Flow release project collected data relates to.
formElement.label: Release Project Name:
